email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer our initial freight quote for the transportation of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 225m.

Our starting quote stands at USD 42.50 per metric ton. The vessel will be available for loading from October 25 to October 30, ensuring a smooth operation.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the quick response. Considering the current market conditions, could there be a possibility to review the rate? We are looking for a more competitive offer to align with our budget constraints.

Could you please consider this and provide a revised quote? Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Michael Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your feedback. After considering the current market conditions, I am able to offer a revised rate of USD 41.00 per MT. This adjustment reflects our commitment to providing competitive rates while maintaining high service standards.

Please let us know if this meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the schedule.

Warm regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Appreciate the revised quote at USD 41.00 per MT. I would like to request further details on the demurrage terms and the vessel's LOA to ensure there won't be issues during berthing at Shanghai.

Also, could you confirm the laycan period remains as previously stated? A precise schedule is crucial for our operations.

Thank you,
Michael Scott

email_chain.subject: Re: Details & Finalization of Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your continued cooperation. I can confirm that the LOA of MV OCEAN HORIZON is 225m, fully compatible with the docking facilities at Shanghai. Regarding demurrage, we propose a rate of USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if there's a delay beyond the agreed laydays, which remains as October 25-30.

If these terms are acceptable, I suggest we finalize our agreement to secure the vessel for your shipment. Please let us know your decision at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
Michael Scott
